segments.text: I need a haircut .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have an appointment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't . You look pretty busy today . Do you have an opening for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we do . I can cut your hair right now if you like.Do you need a shampoo too , or just a haircut ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a haircut . I washed my hair this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright . I will have an assistant wet your hair . Then I can cut it.Please step over there.How would you like your hair cut today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I last had a haircut eight weeks ago . So my hair is pretty long.But I want the same style .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I recommend you leave it a little long on top.But we should take in the back and sides a bit more . That's more fashionable now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . You are the expert . I'm happy to have your recommendation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So I will cut the sides just above the ear . Is that good ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And do you usually part your hair along here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , I know just what to do.Your hair seems quite dry , you know . And I see some split ends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I know my hair is quite thin.It runs in my family . Everybody has very thin hair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The problem is the split ends . They make your hair look even more frizzy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know what to do about it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , there are two things you can do.First , don't blow-dry your hair for so long after you shower . Let it dry naturally.That is easier on the hair , so you won't get split ends.Second , buy a g
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you sell conditioner here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . I have one I can suggest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . I would be happy to try it . I know my hair doesn't look good now . It's too weak .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The problem is the split ends .
segments.speaker: S2
